name: Achref SOUA
summary: Data Scientist with 2 years of experience in language models, and computer vision. Expert in developing end-to-end LLM pipelines from prototyping to production. Curious, autonomous, and impact-driven, I design robust and scalable AI solutions to solve complex business problems.

experience.summary: Developing advanced medical imaging solutions for cardiovascular interventions. Working on multi-label segmentation of arterial and cardiac structures, 3D mesh generation and calculations for surgical planning, optimizing data pipelines and processing workflows to support precision medicine initiatives.
experience.details:
• Multi-Label Segmentation: Segment complex cardiovascular anatomy (aorta, branches, cardiac structures) from CT/MRI imaging
• 3D Modelling and Mesh Calculations: Generate and refine 3D meshes from segmentation masks, computing geometric measurements for surgical planning
• Data Operations and Workflows: Optimize ETL pipelines for medical imaging data processing and quality assurance
• Data Processing: Implement robust data validation, normalization, and storage workflows for medical datasets
• Clinical Collaboration: Work with physicians and medical device companies to validate tools and ensure clinical relevance

experience.summary: Developing an advanced multi-agent FinOps assistant with LLaMA 3 for modular cost analysis. Optimized long-term memory for multi-turn dialogues, improving coherence by 23%. Deployed on AWS (Lambda, S3, Bedrock) with CI/CD pipelines ensuring scalability and high reliability.
experience.details:
• Multi-Agent Architecture: Designed modular system with LangGraph and LLaMA 3 for cost analysis and optimization recommendations
• Long-Term Memory: Optimized memory management for multi-turn conversations with 23% coherence improvement
• LLaMA 3 Integration: Leveraged LLaMA 3 with custom prompting for financial domain expertise
• AWS Deployment: Lambda, S3, Bedrock with auto-scaling and CI/CD pipelines
• Performance: High reliability and scalability in production environments
